p: Regarding wheat, in the present scenario, mean AFI was 0.7. According to the model predictions, over 90% of the sites may allow A. flavus growth (AFI > 0), although with very low AFI values. Mean AFI increased by 60% and more than doubled in the +2 °C and +5 °C scenarios, respectively ( Table 1), but the probability of aflatoxin contamination in wheat is so low that it can be considered irrelevant.
